title: Sociological Theory - The Dual Dependency of Natural-Resource-Rich Labor Markets in Contemporary Society

description: Author Tom Mueller discusses his article, "The Dual Dependency of Natural-Resource-Rich Labor Markets in Contemporary Society," published in the June 2021 issue of Sociological Theory.
